verbs.description: The idea of [ARG0: Democrats] [V: winning] [ARGM-DIR: back] [ARG1: Trump voters] is folly , an exercise in chasing the wind .
[ARG1: The idea of Democrats winning back Trump voters] [V: is] [ARG2: folly , an exercise in chasing the wind] .
